Name: I find this situation very regrettable.
Text: I find this situation very regrettable. No man of your stature should be subjected to such circumstances.

Name: I am trying my best
Text: I am trying my best and I want to apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Name: I will try to fix it.
Text: I'm a bit overloaded at the moment, but I will try to fix it.

Name: problem?
Text: Are you sure this is a problem? I wasn't involved in this.

Name: Foools
Text: You realy think that this is okay
